doc.title: Metalmania 2007
doc.plot: Metalmania is the biggest and the most prestigious metal festival in Central-Eastern Europe. Every year the main stage plays host to the top metal bands from around the world (DVD), while on the side stage there's a preview of the young Polish metal scene (CD). The 2007 edition of Metalmania was crowned with performances of cult bands: thrash-metal Testament, thrash/death metal Sepultura, doom/gothic metal Paradise Lost, the pioneers of death'n'roll Entombed, plus many more! These performances were shot with 7 cameras so you can expect a truly amazing recording. The DVD also includes detailed info about all bands (biographies, discographies, web links), photo gallery, festival history, desktop images, and short interviews with all main stage bands featured on the DVD. METAL at its best!
